subject: I thing i buy the wrong one
description_text:
Hello mate ,

I want to buy this one Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic
Reactor
But i think i miss click and bought the wrong one.
Can you please solve this ?
Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi，Nathanaël Mullier，  ​   Hello, have you already placed your order? If not, please refer to the link below to place your order.   ​   https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-plus-x-pedals https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor

Hello ,

But no mistake I did the good order .

Was my bad

Thx for help .

Le ven. 13 juin 2025 à 05:52, service@simsonn.com
